ComicInfo.Summary:
Dr. Nat Reeves is barely back in action at St. Lilith’s hospital for the preternatural, and the stress is already piling on. She still hasn’t informed her family, and her coworkers are whispering rumors about her previous departure. For all that, the place hasn’t changed much—each new emergency brings them all closer to the edge. ER meets Hellboy!
